name: Strength
description: Increases the damage dealt with strength-based weapons and skills, as well as the carry weight and the ability to move heavier objects.

name: Finesse
description: Increases damage dealt with finesse-based weapons and skills.

name: Intelligence
description: Increases damage dealt with intelligence-based weapons and skills.

name: Constitution
description: Determines the amount of Vitality the character has.

name: Memory
description: Determines how many Skills can be memorized at any one time.  Most skills only require a single memory slot. More powerful skills require more memory slots and source points.

name: Wits
description: Affects your Critical Chance, Initiative, and ability to detect traps and find hidden treasures.
